codes.CUST: Customer requested to stop/cancel the cheque.
codes.DUPL: Cheque has been issued in duplication of another cheque.
codes.NARR: Reason is provided as narrative information in the additional reason information.

description: Specifies the external cheque cancellation reason code in the format of character string with a maximum length of 4 characters.
name: ExternalChequeCancellationReason1Code
